titleStmt.title: The Quakers answer, to the Quakers wedding, November, 8. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dorman Newman at the Kings-Armes in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "O Times! O Manners! Both indeed are ..."
In response to Matthew Stevenson's The Quakers wedding, October, 24. 1671.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
